title: looping loginpage after fresh installation
body:
tested with lasted version from github, latest stable release.  
environment vserver ubuntu 12.04
server apache
database mysql
client firefox/chrome/internetexplorer
php 5.3.10

after fresh installation i can't login, looping at loginpage.


my virtual hosts:
```
  1 <virtualhost *:80>
  2   servername *****.******.**
  3   serveralias www.*****.******.**
  4   documentroot /var/www/cloud
  5   serveradmin ****@******.**
  6   errorlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/error.log
  7   loglevel warn
  8   customlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/access-log combined
  9 </virtualhost>
```

```
  1 <ifmodule mod_ssl.c>
  2 <virtualhost *:443>
  3   sslengine on
  4   sslcertificatechainfile /****/****.crt
  5   sslcertificatekeyfile /****/****.key
  6   sslcertificatefile /****/****.crt
  7   serveradmin ****@******.**
  8   servername *****.******.**
  9   serveralias www.*****.******.**
 10   documentroot /var/www/cloud
 11   errorlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/ssl_error.log
 12   loglevel warn
 13   customlog ${apache_log_dir}/vhosts/ssl_access.log combined
 14 </virtualhost>
 15 </ifmodule>
```

my httpd.conf
```
  1 <directory "/var/www/owncloud">
  2   order allow,deny
  3   allow from all
  4   allowoverride all
  5 </directory>
```


error.log: 
```
 [fri mar 08 14:06:54 2013] [error] [client 10.10.0.5] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
```

at latest develop version, i getting error in owncloud.log:
```
"{"app":"php","message":"mysql_close(): 46 is not a valid mysql-link resource at \/var\/www\/owncloud\/lib\/setup.php#273","level":2,"time":1362748023}"
```
in latest stable release the owncloud.log is empty.
